item.title: OKE-FREE
item.description: During my studies on Kubernetes, I encountered some limitations when using Kind and other tools to run a Kubernetes cluster locally. Due to these typical limitations of a local cluster, I went looking for a cost-free alternative. While there was some material talking about the creation of a cluster, I couldn’t find any that were up-to-date and easily replicable.
